abstract: Oprah Winfrey personally handed out Apple iPads and $10,000 checks to every staffer at O, The Oprah Magazine.
snippet: Oprah Winfrey personally handed out Apple iPads and $10,000 checks to every staffer at O, The Oprah Magazine.
lead_paragraph: You’ll be forgiven if the following news makes you wonder why your boss hasn’t lavished gifts on you lately.

headline.main: From Oprah Winfrey, Generous Gifts for Her Magazine Staff
